title: Location, Community, Quality Living. It Starts Here!
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Huntington Apartments', 'Welcome to The Huntington apartments, bringing you the best of Colorado living right to your door.', 'Our beautiful, welcoming community in Lakewood, CO adjoins Sister City Park with plenty of wide open space and great running trails.', 'Rather ride?', 'The Huntington apartments are just minutes from Bear Creek bike trail.', 'And if shopping is more your style, check out the Belmar Shopping District with cafes and shops, fine dining, and arts and culture.', 'Make your move and visit The Huntington apartments today!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 735 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Designer Two-Tone Paint*', '- Oak Cabinetry', '- Spacious Walk-in Closets', '- Pet Yards*', '- In Home Washer and Dryer', '- Newly Upgraded interiors', '- Stainless Steel Appliance Packages*', '- Wood Burning Fireplaces', '- Dishwashers', '- Wired for Technology', '- Ceiling Fans*', '- Central Air Conditioning and Heat', '- Cathedral Ceilings with Skylights*', '- Energy Star Appliances', '- Personal Balcony or Patio*', '- Linen Closets*', 'Community Amenities', '- Fire Pit', '- Green Friendly Community', '- Breathtaking Mountain Views', '- Carports', '- Convenient Access to I-25, E-470, I-70', '- Resort-Inspired Pool and Year-round Spa', '- Basketball Court', '- Adjoining Sister City Park', '- Fitness Center', '- Community Grill', '- Business Center', '- Access to Walking and Biking Paths', '- Minutes from Red Rocks Amphitheatre', '- 24-Hour Emergency Maintenance', '- Tennis Court', '- On-Site Laundry Facility', 'Pet Policy', 'Pets - Max 2 allowed', 'Comments: We welcome your furry friends here at The Huntington!', 'Max weight is not to exceed 80 lbs for both pets.', 'Restrictions: Breed restrictions do apply.', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:9:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', 'Sunday:12:00PM-5:00PM', 'The Huntington Apartments', '8223 W Floyd Ave, Lakewood, CO, 80227', 'bkaD5cOIP']
